document_data.name: Ledger of the Sandvoyagers Guild
document_data.author: [[Tolnus Granicus]], [[Thurnas Netmaster]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ledger of the Sandvoyagers Guild''''' was a ledger book belonging to the [[Sandvoyagers Guild]], which operated in the [[Raurin]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]..
document_data.History: Adventurers might've found the book around {{yearlink|1356}}; it may have made it evident to them that the Sandvoyagers Guild had been taken over by a slaver ring, as its latter contents were faked by [[Thurnas Netmaster]].
